channel.title: [Delta]Item on Object[Delta]
channel.description:
Sup guys, I was wondering if someone could make for me a code which players allow to use an item on a object and get serval items/exp
like: Use Key on > Chest Congratz you rechieved #### attack xp and a whip
Thanks

item.title: [Delta]Item on Object[Delta]
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

Try something like this
keyID chestID
if(ItemID == #### && UsedOnObjectID == ####){
addItem(995,5000000);
item ammount
talk(“Congratulations you have received item name.”, 945);
}

make it look like this but with your numbers

if(ItemID == 1 && UsedOnObjectID == 1){
addItem(995,5000000);
talk(“Congratulations you have received money.”, 945);
}

Sources: my brain
hope it worked

Read full topic
